column5:
Merge pull request #119 from davidcornu/error-objects

Reject promises with Error objects

Merge pull request #122 from kennethormandy/ko-create-observers-example

Adds an example of dynamically creating observers, closes #121
Adds an example of dynamically creating observers, closes #121
Let's push the changes as well.
Add copyright to dist files. Closes #98.

Do not hide rulers by positioning them on the left of the viewport.

A ruler that is positioned offscreen with left: -999px causes
scrollbars on the page when the page is in right-to-left mode
(i.e. dir="rtl"). Instead of figuring out the directionality
of the page we just position the rulers on top of the viewport.
This shouldn't cause any additional problems because we already
have an existing top: -999px in place.

Closes #103.

Merge pull request #101 from blake-education/bugfix/module-exports-check

Check that module is an object, rather than that it's defined

Merge pull request #94 from tv2/feature/support-webviews

Modified the check for the Safari 10 bug to look at AppleWebKit versions
Modified the Safari 10 bug check to factor in whether or not the browser supports native font-loading
Modified the check for the Safari 10 bug to look at AppleWebKit versions
Upgrade to slightly more recent closure compiler.
Re-enable support for the native font loading API in Safari 10.1 and add tests.
Add font-synthesis to the ruler to avoid faux styles (in browsers that support it.)

Merge pull request #86 from bramstein/bs-disable-font-loading-api-on-safari-10

Disable native font loading API on Safari 10 due to two implementation bugs
Disable native font loading API on Safari 10 due to two implementation bugs.

Merge pull request #76 from themoonrat/clear-timeout

Clearing a reject timeout if the promise has resolved
spacing fixed to match style in rest of code
Clearing the timeout if the promise has resolved
Fix escaping font family names when calling the native font loading API. Closes #70.
Use document.fonts to detect native font loading support. Using FontFace gave a false positive on Firefox 24. Closes #73 and #66.
Detect support for the native font loading API at runtime.
Update homepage, bugs, and repository in package.json.
Remove old connect and watch options in Gruntfile. Run JSHint when running tests.
Do not export to global namespace if loaded through a module loader. Also remove old and deprecated check method.
Simplify variable names in the README.

Merge pull request #61 from bramstein/bs-rename-check-to-load

Rename check to load
Rename check to load, but alias check to load so we don't break backwards compatibility.
Fix bug where a long loading font could pass the timeout.
Upgrade to latest version of closure-dom.

Merge pull request #47 from bramstein/bs-ie8-support

Support for IE8.

Merge pull request #49 from dandaka/doc-upd-fout

FOUT example in README with JS/CSS
FOUT example in README with JS/CSS
Upgrade closure-dom and use the new methods.
Export both on the window and module.exports object when running under CommonJS.
Move promis and closure-dom to dev dependencies as they are only used when building Font Face Observer.
Remove variant and featureSettings from README.
Limit the files included in the npm package.
Add minified and gzipped size of the Promise polyfill.
Rename dist builds to avoid conflicts with existing versions.
Add support for detecting font loads even if the @font-face rule isn't in the CSSOM yet.
Add support for CommonJS and create a build file with and without a promise polyfill.
Use latest version of Promise polyfill.
Add support for native font loading API and drop variant and feature settings (not used for font matching anyway).

Merge pull request #45 from kennethormandy/ko-readme-multiple

Adds details from #44 to README

Adds details from #44 to README

Fixes typo

Fixes typo

Fixes typo
Fix font load detection on RTL pages.
Timeout identifier does not need to be exported so use it as a simple dot property.

Merge pull request #43 from phyllisstein/cancel-timeout

Clear the #checkForInterval() timeout when resolving promise.
Fix bug causing detection to fail for fonts with spaces in name.

Merge pull request #29 from ttamminen/patch-1

Change how npm package is referenced

Change how npm package is referenced

The referenced npm package is automatically resolved by the npm and therefore it's more future proof.

For example, if you install using npm 3 and flat hierarchy, you might encounter a problem if the package is moved to an upper level. This would happen if you have a project that is using an npm module that has a FontFaceObserver dependency.
Add .travis.yml and make everything run on PhantomJS.
Use external Promise library instead of compiling it in.

Merge pull request #28 from iamcarrico/small-device-white-bar

On small devices, Ruler creates white bar on right side of screen
Make sure font size can not be overridden with inherit.
Add a overflow:hidden to the overlying element to prevent push around

Merge pull request #22 from XhmikosR/patch-1

Update README.md

Update README.md

Use syntax highlighting when possible.
Move exports out of main source directory.

Merge pull request #21 from BradleyStaples/master

allow removeContainer to remove container from non-body parent

Merge pull request #16 from bramstein/bs-move-dom

Move dom into its own library.
Move dom into its own library.
Wait for body element to be available before inserting test elements.
Use unexpected from NPM instead of a local copy.
Fall back to polling the DOM when the window/tab is inactive or when the page visibility API is not available.
Use greater or equal when comparing to the timeout value.
Change timeout to poll every 50ms instead of using a fixed timeout.
Forget about weird browser clones with incorrect user agent strings.
Fix missing done parameter in test case.
Fix bug for metric compatible fonts.
Add test for detecting locally installed fonts.
Upgrade to latest version of Closure Compiler.
Position rulers offscreen so they do not show scrollbars.
Add timeout parameter to the check method.
Remove container right after detecting font load.
Fix bad logic for browsers that have the WebKit fallback bug.
Fix tests after exposing observer properties.
Include promise polyfill for older browsers.
Remove console.log so we can run the test suite in a browser without support.
Stop using bind as it is not available on older Android WebKit browsers.
Add option to download only the code or the code + promise polyfill.
Use promis as a polyfill instead of embedding it.
Fix Google Fonts name and link
Increase font load test timeouts to 5 seconds for IE.
